## NetworkScope enum

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Type for various network address scopes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum NetworkScope 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  default | <code>&quot;default&quot;</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |
|  external | <code>&quot;external&quot;</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |

## Remarks

The details of this type are very experimental. Use the constants `NetworkScope.external` and `NetworkScope.default` instead of strings to reduce the chance of breakage.
